derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from the earlier noun philander 'man, husband', often used in literature as the given name of a lover, from Greek philandros 'fond of men', from philein 'to love' + aner 'man'

means.word_mean: 2. talk or behave amorously, without serious intentions;
